Detailed Description

Basic PF configuration, pf enable/disable and After Hours settings.

Definition in file conf.php.

Function Documentation

PrintAfterHoursForm (  ) 

Prints After Hour modification form.

Sample After Hour lines in cron file:

30 19 * * 1,2,3,4,5,6 /sbin/pfctl -a AfterHours -f /etc/pf.conf.afterhours 0 9 * * 1,2,3,4,5,6 /sbin/pfctl -a AfterHours -Fr * * * * 7 /sbin/pfctl -a AfterHours -f /etc/pf.conf.afterhours

Warning:
Sunday is also 0, but should not be used in After Hours lines.
